    def switch_to_payment_window(self):
        for attempt in range(3):

                    "easebuzz_frame_xpath",
                    self.easebuzz_frame_xpath,
                    condition="presence"
                )
                self.switch_to_frame(easebuzz_iframe)
                print("[DEBUG] Successfully switched to Easebuzz iframe")
                return
    
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"[WARN] Retry {attempt + 1}/3 failed -> {e}")
